timeline.message:
Configure Autoscaling deciders using settings

Autoscaling deciders are now configured using settings, allowing an
easy way to add default values as well as building upon the existing
setting code. This makes it easier to add new deciders since there
is no need for a separate configuration object.

Validate setting parse failure

Also ensure that ByteSizeValue always has the setting name in validation
failure message.
